details: Craftsmen save 15% of their ingredients when they craft items in the Brakmar area.
Experience gained in the Agony V'Helley area is increased by 100%.
The quantity of Hornbeam Wood and Dark Bamboo Wood harvested by lumberjacks is increased by 150%.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Petrified Forest area.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against Moon pirates.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Frigost Village area are increased by 100%.
Experience gained in the Wind Dojo dungeon is increased by 125%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 150% against creatures in the Wabbit family.
The quantity of Hops harvested by farmers is increased by 125%.
All varieties of Indigo Dragoturkey will give birth to one extra baby.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against monsters in the Bottomless Peat Bog area.
Fishermen save 10% of their ingredients when they craft items.
Experience gained by fighting dungeon keepers is increased by 100%.
The quantity of Five-Leaf Clovers harvested by alchemists is increased by 125%.
The chances of obtaining loot from Plains Boars are increased by 150%.
Experience gained in the Zoth Village area is increased by 100%.

Ayerish Kaffee is waiting near the Amakna Village Inn for adventurers who want to join him for a drink. His blessing will temporarily put you in the Bulbanauze state (which will disappear when a fight is launched) as well as the Barstud state (bonus of 5% + 10 on all resistances for 15 fights).
Experience gained in the professions related to weapon and equipment crafting (Smiths, Carvers, Jewellers, Shoemakers, Tailors, and Artificers) is increased by 50%.
The quantity of Manganese harvested by miners is increased by 150%.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Sakai Abandoned Mine dungeon are increased by 125%.
Experience gained by fighting Gobballs is increased by 150%.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against Plain Cracklers.
All types of wood will reappear 100% more quickly than usual.
Craftsmen save 15% of their ingredients when they craft items in the Cania Fields area.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Snowfoux Caverns area are increased by 100%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Bearbarian Hive area.
The quantity of Maggoty Meat harvested by Hunters is increased by 125%.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against Mastogobs.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Alma's Cradle area.
The chances of obtaining loot from creatures in the Tanuki family are increased by 75%.
A special repeatable quest is available today near the Masqueraider Temple. It is available to players of level 20 or higher and is not attached to the offering quest.
